title: Stephen Sprouse & Louis Vuitton
content:
Does anybody know if the type that Stephen Sprouse uses on Vuitton bags and purses is hand made or it's a commercial font? If it's hand made, is there a similar type available?

Thans a lot!

[http://www.neo2.es/blog/wp-content/uploads/2-louis-vuitton-sprouse.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100823064628/http:/www.neo2.es/blog/wp-content/uploads/2-louis-vuitton-sprouse.jpg "http://www.neo2.es/blog/wp-content/uploads/2-louis-vuitton-sprouse.jpg")  
 [http://images.cdn.thefashionspot.com/article\_imgs/image/sprouse/2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100823064628/http:/images.cdn.thefashionspot.com/article_imgs/image/sprouse/2.jpg "http://images.cdn.thefashionspot.com/article\_imgs/image/sprouse/2.jpg")  
 [http://2.bp.blogspot.com/\_Qq4DAZat24k/SVpMXDLxhKI/AAAAAAAAHGY/gMUW4p\_Vth...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100823064628/http:/2.bp.blogspot.com/_Qq4DAZat24k/SVpMXDLxhKI/AAAAAAAAHGY/gMUW4p_VthA/s400/louis_vuitton-stephen-sprouse-speedy30.jpg "http://2.bp.blogspot.com/\_Qq4DAZat24k/SVpMXDLxhKI/AAAAAAAAHGY/gMUW4p\_VthA/s400/louis\_vuitton-stephen-sprouse-speedy30.jpg")
author: alexandracama

comments.content: AFAIK Sprouse has always used his own handwriting.
